Class pathFinder

java.lang.Object
com.goblinskeep.pathFinder.pathFinder
public class pathFinder extends Object
Handles the pathfinding logic for entities in the game. Calculates the shortest path from a start node to a goal node while avoiding obstacles.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<Node>
    pathList
    The final path of nodes from start to goal.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a pathFinder instance with the specified GamePanel.

    Method
    Description
    void
    createNodes()
    Initializes the 2D array of nodes based on the game world's column and row size.

    Calculates the G (movement) and H (heuristic) costs for the given node.
    void
    openNode(Node node)
    Adds a neighbouring node to the open list if it's not explored or solid.

    Resets the nodes to their initial state to prepare for new pathfinding operation.

  • Field Details

    • pathList

      public ArrayList<Node> pathList
      The final path of nodes from start to goal.

  • Constructor Details

    • pathFinder

      public pathFinder(GamePanel gp)
      Constructs a pathFinder instance with the specified GamePanel.
      Parameters:
      gp - the GamePanel instance

  • Method Details

    • createNodes

      public void createNodes()
      Initializes the 2D array of nodes based on the game world's column and row size. Each node represents a tile and stores its coordinates.

    • resetNodes

      public void resetNodes()
      Resets the nodes to their initial state to prepare for new pathfinding operation.

    • setNodes

      public void setNodes(int startCol, int startRow, int goalCol, int goalRow)
      Sets the start and goal nodes for the pathfinding. Also calculates the cost values and marks solid tiles.
      Parameters:
      startCol - the column of the start node
      startRow - the row of the start node
      goalCol - the column of the goal node
      goalRow - the row of the goal node

    • getCost

      public void getCost(Node node)
      Calculates the G (movement) and H (heuristic) costs for the given node. The final cost (F) is the sum of G and H.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to calculate the cost for

    • search

      public boolean search()
      Performs A* pathfiniding algorithm to find a path from the start node to the goal node.
      Returns:
      true if the goal is reached, false otherwise

    • openNode

      public void openNode(Node node)
      Adds a neighbouring node to the open list if it's not explored or solid.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to consider opening.

    • trackThePath

      public void trackThePath()
      Traces the path from the goal node back to the start node. adds the shortest path to pathList.

    • searchPath

      public void searchPath(int goalCol, int goalRow, Entity entity)
      Finds a path for a given entity to move towards the goal position. Also updates the entity's direction based on teh next step in the path
      Parameters:
      goalCol - the column of the goal position
      goalRow - the row of the goal position
      entity - the entity to find the path for
